statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions
SELECT customer_id, email, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions
SELECT email, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT MAX(product_id) AS max_product_id FROM CustomerInteractions
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE product_id = 12345 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email, product_id FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE interaction_date >= '2023-01-01' AND interaction_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE product_id IN (9876, 5432, 6543) ORDER BY interaction_type;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractions GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING total_interactions > 10 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, interaction_history FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 2 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (3, 4, 5) AND email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT campaign_name, target_customers FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'Email' ORDER BY campaign_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT interaction_description FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Feedback';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email_address, interaction_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_description FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT customer_name, interaction_count FROM customers WHERE interaction_count > 10 ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type FROM interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_type, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'promotional'
SELECT interaction_count FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM campaign_interactions
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE interaction_count > 5 ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, interaction_count FROM customers WHERE interaction_count >= 10 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT customer_name, email, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM Customer_Interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_details FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Email_Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM Email_Campaigns WHERE campaign_name LIKE '%Summer%';
SELECT * FROM Customer_Interactions;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM Customer_Interactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.interaction_date, e.campaign_name FROM Customer_Interactions c JOIN Email_Campaigns e ON c.customer_id = e.campaign_id;
SELECT cr.result_id, cr.email_opened, cs.segment_name FROM Campaign_Results cr JOIN Customer_Segments cs ON cr.customer_id = cs.segment_id;
SELECT cm.mapping_id, cm.customer_id, cs.segment_description FROM Segment_Mapping cm JOIN Customer_Segments cs ON cm.segment_id = cs.segment_id WHERE cm.customer_id = 3;
